mapper.sql: id, storage_no, warehouse_no, warehouse_name, shelf_no, sku_code, price, total_price, currency, upc, quantity, trans_quantity, purchase_storage_no, buyer_task_detail_no, item_code, sku_buysite, creator, modifier,status
mapper.select: SELECT T1.id as id,T1.sku_id AS skuId,T1.sku_code AS skuCode,T1.quantity,T1.trans_quantity AS transQuantity,T1.price as price,T1.total_price AS totalPrice,T1.warehouse_id AS warehouseId,T1.warehouse_name AS warehouseName,T1.upc as upc,T1.currency AS currency,T1.shelf_no AS shelfNo,T1.sto_order_no AS stoOrderNo,T1.storage_id AS storageId,T1.item_id AS itemId,T1.gmt_create AS gmtCreate,T1.gmt_modify AS gmtModify,T1.task_daily_detail_id AS taskDailyDetailId,T1.sku_buysite AS skuBuysite,T2.item_name as itemName,T2.sku_pic as skuPic, T2.color as color ,T2.scale as scale,T2.buy_site as buySite,T2.purchase_price AS purchasePrice,T2.cost_price AS costPrice,T2.discount AS discount,T3.count AS taskDailyCount,T3.in_count AS inCount,T3.purchase_upc AS purchaseUpc,T3.pass_reason AS passReason, case T2.scale WHEN 'XXS' THEN 1 WHEN 'XS' THEN 2 WHEN 'S' THEN 3 WHEN 'M' THEN 4 WHEN 'L' THEN 5 WHEN 'XL' THEN 6 WHEN 'XXL' THEN 7 end as scale_int FROM purchase_storage_detail T1 left join item_sku T2 on T1.sku_id=T2.id left join task_daily_detail T3 on T1.task_daily_detail_id=T3.id where T1.storage_id = #{storageId} ORDER BY IFNULL(T2.buy_site, ''),trim(T2.item_name),T2.color,(T2.scale+0),scale_int
mapper.update: UPDATE purchase_storage_detail SET upc=#{upc} WHERE (upc!=#{upc} or upc is null) and sku_id=#{skuId};
mapper.select: SELECT a.sku_id as skuId,SUM(a.quantity) AS quantity FROM purchase_storage_detail a left join purchase_storage b on a.`storage_Id`=b.id WHERE a.gmt_create >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND a.gmt_create <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59') AND b.`status`=1 GROUP BY a.sku_id;
